name: 楊勝明
objective: 本課程從基本的磁路分析及永久磁鐵開始，首先介紹無刷直流的運轉原理及控制方法，然後探討永磁同步電動機之控制理論，及驅動電路技術，最後說明控制系統實現及無轉軸位置感測器控制的方法。
schedule:
1. PM and magnetic circuit
2. BLDC basics
3. Stator and rotor design
4. Motor drive and control
5. BLDC sensorless control, Mid-term exam #1
6. PMSM basics
7. Complex vector transformation
8. Mathematical model
9. Mathematical model
10. Vector control
11. Maximum torque control
12. Current control, Mid-term exam #2
13. Sinusoidal PWM
14. Space Vector PWM
15. Initial position sensing
16. Sensorless vector control
17. Sensorless vector control
18. Final exam
scorePolicy:
Home works: 20%
Mid-term exam #1: 25%
Mid-term exam #2: 25%
Final exam: 30%
materials:
Lecture notes.

References:
1. Permanent Magnet Synchronous and Brushless DC Motor Drives, by Ramu Krishnan, CRC Press 2010.
2. Brushless Permanent Motor Design, 2nd Edition, by Duane Hanselman.
